description: Run show commands on nvOS device.

pn_clipassword.description: Provide login password if user is not root.

pn_command.description: The C(pn_command) takes a CLI show command as value.

pn_cliusername.description: Provide login username if user is not root.

pn_parameters.description: Display output using a specific parameter. Use 'all' to display possible output. List of comma separated parameters.

pn_cliswitch.description: Target switch(es) to run the cli on.
